description_top: Collectio Verborum et sententiarum quae in Hebraeo Codice extant et in LXX virali desiderantur; necnon Lectiones variae et phrases: et vice versa quae in LXX virali (Grabiana Editione) interpolantur et varie leguntur.
title: Collectio Verborum et sententiarum quae in Hebraeo Codice extant et in LXX virali desiderantur; necnon Lectiones variae et phrases: et vice versa quae in LXX virali (Grabiana Editione) interpolantur et varie leguntur.
author: Edward Griffith, fl. 1753
description: A compilation of Hebrew words and expressions from the Hebrew Bible, with Greek translation.
contents: Hebrew words with Latin and Greek translations, and biblical references.
contents_note: Inscribed on pastedown of upper board: ‘Anno 1779. Ludovicus Bagot, Aedis Christi Decanus dono dedit librum hunc ab Edvardo Griffith A.B. ex aula Magdaleno, Oxon. conscriptum Edv. Griffith obiit 1753’.
layout: Text written in two columns, from left to right; first column is in Hebrew, arranged alphabetically and the second column is in Latin, with biblical references and translations in Latin and Greek.
extent: ff. ii empty leaves + 158 leaves + ii empty leaves (all foliated).
dimensions: 223 x 174 x 28 mm (size of binding); ca. 216-199 x 165 mm (size of leaf)
binding: Late 18th or early 19th century English vellum with blind-tooled borders; sewn onto three supports; with shelfmark on the spine.
provenance: Oxford. Given to Christ Church by Lewis Bagot (1740-1802), bishop of Bristol, Norwich, and St Asaph; as well, as canon and dean of Christ Church.
record_origin: Description based on Kitchin, Catalogus Codicum MSS. qui in Bibliotheca Aedis Christi apud Oxonienses (Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1867).
